column5: Nice work by the Canadian Juniors this afternoon.Sad to still see the bad dives and officiating over there. Boy I was getting frustrated.  3-0 for our boys.  WELL DONE
The only thing shaky about that game was the officiating. Some brutal calls. Anyway our boys won, go get em.
They`ll take the 2 points but they will have to tighten up a bit 44 shots against will not do.

Ya...didn't look great the first two periods IMO Don't get me wrong, they looked good, but they were not really gelling well and had trouble getting to the net it seemed? But they came on later, and I felt a bit better about them.  But Boy oh Boy....what is up with those officials? Its ALWAYS bad but what was with the Phantom calls?  Lets hope the officiating comes on later as well LOL!
